title: Friends Account Sending Spam Messages
body: Just yesterday my friend's account got hacked somehow and someone sent a free Riot Points link which i know is spam to  almost everyone in his friends list, including me and other friends. Today rolls around, and he finds out that what happened, happened, and changed his password. He waited on the game and STILL sent another message right after he changed his password. Concerned that me and my other friends may get hacked is there any way to stop this or prevent this from happening again?

replies.body: As long as you haven't clicked on the link and submitting any information, you should be okay!  It sounds like your friend might still be compromised, though.  Have him fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and also review our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to help secure his info.  We'll help him out directly!
